WindowSize.// Width_comment: Window width of the game application in pixels
WindowSize.// Height_comment: Window height of the game application in pixels

Bot.// IsWhiteBot_comment: Whether the bot is enabled for the white player
Bot.// IsBlackBot_comment: Whether the bot is enabled for the black player
Bot.// WhiteBotLevel_comment: Difficulty level of the white bot (0 means disabled)
Bot.// BlackBotLevel_comment: Difficulty level of the black bot
Bot.// BotScoringType_comment: The scoring method used by the bot (e.g., NumberAndPotential)
Bot.// BotDelayMS_comment: Delay in milliseconds before the bot makes a move
Bot.// NoRandom_comment: Disables randomness in the bot's move selection
Bot.// Optimization_comment: Optimization level of the bot algorithm (e.g., 'O1')

Game.// MaxNumTurns_comment: Maximum number of turns allowed in a game
